drag_drop_flowchart.description: Complete drag-drop decision tree for layout management
drag_drop_flowchart.mermaid_diagram:
graph TD
    Start[Start Drag: New or Existing Element] --> IsNew{Is New Element?}
    
    IsNew -->|Yes| EmptyCheck{Canvas Empty?}
    EmptyCheck -->|Yes| AddFirst[Add to Canvas in Column Layout]
    AddFirst --> UpdateJSON[Update JSON Structure]
    
    EmptyCheck -->|No| PositionDetect[Detect Drop Position]
    PositionDetect --> Pos{Position?}
    
    Pos -->|Top| InsertBefore[Insert Before Existing in Vertical]
    Pos -->|Bottom| InsertAfter[Insert After Existing in Vertical]
    Pos -->|Left| CreateHorizontalLeft[Create/Add to Row Layout on Left]
    Pos -->|Right| CreateHorizontalRight[Create/Add to Row Layout on Right]
    
    InsertBefore --> UpdateLayout[Update Vertical Sequence]
    InsertAfter --> UpdateLayout
    CreateHorizontalLeft --> UpdateHorizontal[Create/Update Row Container]
    CreateHorizontalRight --> UpdateHorizontal
    
    UpdateLayout --> UpdateJSON
    UpdateHorizontal --> UpdateJSON
    
    IsNew -->|No (Existing)| Reorder[Reorder: Drag to New Position]
    Reorder --> NewPos{New Position?}
    
    NewPos -->|Vertical| UpdateVertical[Update Vertical Sequence]
    NewPos -->|Horizontal| UpdateHoriz[Update Horizontal Sequence in Row]
    
    UpdateVertical --> CheckContainer[Check if Old Container Empty?]
    UpdateHoriz --> CheckContainer
    
    CheckContainer -->|Yes| Dissolve[Dissolve Row Container, Promote Remaining Element]
    CheckContainer -->|No| UpdateJSON
    
    Dissolve --> UpdateJSON
    
    UpdateJSON --> End[End: Reflect in Canvas & Save to JSON]
